name: Ably Sink
shortDescription: Capture data from an Ably Hub source

Variables.Name: input
Variables.Description: Name of the input topic to read from

Variables.Name: AblyToken
Variables.Description: The Ably API token to use

Variables.Name: AblyChannel
Variables.Description: The Ably Channel to send to

Variables.Name: AblyMessageNamePrefix
Variables.Description: The prefix for the Ably Message Name
